articles.author: Jake Michaels
articles.title: Djokovic retires injured; Zverev into Aussie final - ESPN
articles.description: A left leg injury forced Novak Djokovic to retire from his Australian Open semifinal match against Alexander Zverev, leading fans to boo him as he left the court.
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia -- Twenty-four-time Grand Slam champion Novak Djokovic retired from his Australian Open semifinal match against Alexander Zverev on Friday afternoon, unable to continue due to a … [+3227 chars]
